role: Special Situations Manager & Head of Prospect Generation
description: Led 15-person Prospect Generation department, conducting M&A diligence that generated over $600M in offers. Member of North American Strategic Planning Committee. Managed complex special situations analysis and strategic transaction evaluation across multiple industries.
Served as Interim Chief Technology Officer, overseeing technology infrastructure, platform architecture, and engineering teams during critical growth phase.
Quantitative trading and portfolio optimization for institutional investment firm managing multi-billion dollar hedge fund assets.
